title: House committee to subpoena Epstein files, Clintons, other Democrats
shortDescription: The move comes as debate over the Justice Department's handling of the Epstein case has roiled Congress and the MAGA base.

title: Video shows red sculpture of Trump emerge from NYC manhole
shortDescription: The bright red, life-size sculpture, titled "Donald," was installed in Midtown Manhattan. It has since been removed.

title: Pam Bondi reportedly told Donald Trump he's named in Epstein files
shortDescription: The attorney general reportedly told President Donald Trump in the spring he was named multiple times in the government's files on Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Trump illegally held up Head Start funding, watchdog says
shortDescription: The White House illegally held up funding for a federal preschool program, the Government Accountability Office found.

title: Trump claims $20 million side pot in '60 Minutes' Paramount settlement
shortDescription: President Trump said he expects to receive $20 million in advertising and programming from Paramount's $16 million "60 Minutes" settlement.

title: Supreme Court hands Trump a win on Consumer Product Safety panel firings
shortDescription: The Trump administration argued the Consumer Product Safety Commission is effectively controlled by Democratic appointees.

title: Trump DOJ loses bid to unseal Epstein grand jury testimony
shortDescription: A Florida federal judge rejected the Justice Department's bid to unseal grand jury testimony tied to investigations of sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Trump and Epstein's relationship explained
shortDescription: Donald Trump and Jeffrey Epstein appeared to be friends in the 90s and early 2000s, but had not spoken for 15 years before Epstein's death.

title: Mike Johnson to shut down House early amid Jeffrey Epstein drama
shortDescription: Plus: President Donald Trump has announced a new trade deal with Japan that sets a 15% tariff. | How much did the military parade cost last month?

title: Trump's Epstein problem: Even his voters want more files released
shortDescription: Jeffrey Epstein is one of the rare issues where Trump appears to be out of step with his base by questioning why public interest remains in the case.

title: Democrats vow to respond to Trump, Texas' redistricting plan
shortDescription: The Lone Star State's potential map redraw could kick off a coast-to-coast redistricting battle.

title: Trump sculpture pops up in NYC street
shortDescription: French artist James Colomina installed a red Trump sculpture with a rat in a New York City manhole.

title: What has Melania Trump done as first lady? Opera house may get her name
shortDescription: Melania Trump has appeared publicly fairly sparingly since her husband took office again. She may have the Kennedy Center opera house named for her.

title: Trump accuses Obama of treason over 2016 election allegations
shortDescription: Donald Trump claims that former President Obama committed treason by attempting to sabotage his 2016 election win with links to Russian interference.

title: Trump accuses Obama of treason in attacks over 2016 Russia probe
shortDescription: President Trump accused former President Obama of leading an effort to falsely tie him to Russia and undermine his 2016 presidential campaign.

title: Trump announces 'massive' Japan trade deal
shortDescription: Trump said the U.S. will impose a 15% tariff on Japanese imports under the agreement, which he hailed as "maybe the largest deal in history."

title: Melania Trump opera house vote stirs debate
shortDescription: A House Appropriations subcommittee voted to change the name of the Kennedy Center opera house after the First Lady Melania Trump.

title: Trump has limited ways to block Washington Commanders' stadium deal
shortDescription: President Trump can't unilaterally block a stadium deal for the Washington Commanders to return to DC. But he has ways he can try to intervene.

title: Who's in charge? DOJ battles judges over Trump prosecutor Alina Habba
shortDescription: The attorney general said she removed the official who was set to replace President Donald Trump's pick to be the top New Jersey federal prosecutor.

title: Can Trump pardon Epstein's partner Ghislaine Maxwell?
shortDescription: Officials want to talk to Gislaine Maxwell, Jeffrey Epstein's co-conspirator serving 20 years in a prison in Florida. Here's what to know.

title: Trump shifts focus from Epstein to Obama claims
shortDescription: President Donald Trump deflected Epstein case questions by reviving unverified claims about President Barack Obama and 2016 election interference.
